results.title: Metformin prevents the pathological browning of subcutaneous white adipose tissue
results.text_hl: This work provides novel insights into the mechanistic underpinnings of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s therapeutic benefits and potential as an agent to reduce the lipotoxicity associated with @<m>DISEASE_Hypermetabolism_due_to_Defect_in_Mitochondria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565498 @@@hypermetabolism@@@ and adipose browning.
